SENT.plain: We report a case of simultaneous presentation of cerebral venous sinus thrombosis and thyrotoxicosis in a 28 year-old female subsequently found to have the Factor V Leiden mutation
She made an excellent neurological recovery with anticoagulation
The mode of presentation of the case was surprising, as she had no thrombotic episodes in two previous pregnancies
This suggests that thyrotoxicosis may give rise to a hypercoagulable state
